attributes.additional_details: This will not only give them purpose but it will give them discipline, training and teamwork abilities there are a lot of industries that tie in with military services this could train police ambulance drivers paramedics firefighters lorry drivers etc, just to name a few
attributes.background:
Bring back national service to all people leaving school without going on to further education 
This should apply to all school leavers, men and boys seeking asylum and also and option for more minor criminal offences

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Require National Service for people from the age of 18 for three years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647113
